steps.name: check-handoff-exists
steps.command: test -d .copilot/handoff && ls .copilot/handoff/\*.md 2>/dev/null | head -5 || echo 'WARNING: No handoff files found'

steps.name: check-submodules
steps.command: test -f libs/eurorack/clouds/dsp/granular\_processor.h && echo 'OK: eurorack submodule present' || echo 'WARNING: eurorack submodule not initialised. Run: git submodule update --init --recursive'
